quotes.quote: No man was ever ruined from without; the final ruin comes from within, when you turn hopeless and lose courage!

Ruin, eldest daughter of Zeus, she blinds us all, that fatal madness—she with those delicate feet of hers, never touching the earth, gliding over the heads of men to trap us all. She entangles one man, now another.
Falling into ruin was a bit like falling in love: Both descents stripped you bare and left you as you were at your core. And both endings are equally painful.
You can ruin anything if you focus at it.
We climb to heaven most often on the ruins of our cherished plans, finding our failures were successes.
If a man has directed his course to great ends there is compensation even in ruin.
Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
Sentiment without action is the ruin of the soul.
Don’t ruin your own happiness by letting someone’s wickedness hurt you.
You can't change the past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about the future.
Protect your good image from the eyes of negative viewers, who may look at your good appearance with an ugly fiendish eye, and ruin your positive qualities with their chemical infested tongues.
Worry is a progressive disease that ruins one’s life
How many different kinds of ruin do you have to see, before you resign yourself to calling it all 'ruin'?
Ruins, for me, are the beginning. With the debris, you can construct new ideas. They are symbols of a beginning.
To be silent when we are impelled to utter words injurious to God or to our neighbour, is an act of virtue; but, to be silent in confessing our sins, is the ruin of the soul.
Routine ruins the life, variety vitalise the life.
Someday was the thing he had, because it was a lot harder to ruin than today.
A thousand years may scare form a state. An hour may lay it in ruins.
Just because you're unhappy doesn't mean you have to ruin someone else's happiness too ...
How marriage ruins a man! It is as demoralizing as cigarettes, and far more expensive.
It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
You can reconstruct the picture from chaos and memory's ruins.
